document_data.name: Korth
document_data.Description: Korth was a muscular lizardman with green scales that were mottled yellow, and with a pronounced yellow and orange neck ridge. He wore blue clothing, blue battle paint, and a partial suit of light armor that left his chest bare. Korth adorned himself with several animal bones and teeth, and wore a skull over one shoulder. His head was topped with a [[wikipedia:Kabuto#Parts_of_the_kabuto|''maedate'']].
document_data.Personality: He was famously ruthless, never sparing a single defeated foe. Korth had a fondness for appearing "strong," and liked eating [[fish]].
document_data.Abilities: Korth was known for his great skill and speed in battle.
document_data.Possessions: In battle, he carried a [[katana]] and wore a personalized banner strapped to his back.
document_data.History: Korth was raised in a Kara-Turan fighting pit, where he learned the gladiator's trade. He eventually left the arena behind, traveling the world to study the art of war.
